laboratory_examinations.findings: 63 white cells per mm3, with 18% segmented neutrophils, 64% lymphocytes, and 18% macrophages; glucose 45 mg/dl (normal range: 40–70), total protein 190 mg/dl (normal range: 15–45). Xanthochromia present.
